tasks.title: Post-write: Thumbnail Preview
tasks.description: Add thumbnail preview functionality in post write page
tasks.details: Implement thumbnail preview feature when writing a post. Allow users to upload and preview thumbnail images before publishing.

tasks.title: Index: Show Thumbnail in Post-list
tasks.description: Display thumbnail images in post list on index page
tasks.details: Show thumbnail preview images in the post list on the main index page. Each post item should display its associated thumbnail.

tasks.title: Create About Page
tasks.description: Create a new About page for the blog
tasks.details: Build an About page that introduces the blog and author. Include information about the purpose of the blog and author bio.

tasks.title: Fix React Infinite Re-render Error
tasks.description: Fix 'Too many re-renders' error causing infinite loop in React components
tasks.details: Debug and resolve the React infinite render loop error. Identify components with improper state updates, useEffect dependencies, or event handler definitions causing re-renders. Apply proper fixes such as useCallback, useMemo, or correct dependency arrays.

tasks.title: Post Edit and Delete
tasks.description: Implement post edit and delete functionality
tasks.details: Add edit and delete features for blog posts. Create edit page/modal to modify existing posts. Implement delete confirmation dialog and proper post deletion with database cleanup.

tasks.title: Comment Edit and Delete
tasks.description: Implement comment edit and delete functionality
tasks.details: Add edit and delete features for comments. Create inline edit mode for existing comments. Implement delete confirmation and proper comment removal from database. Ensure only comment authors can edit/delete their own comments.
